What is Instagram TV (IG TV)?

Up until now, Instagram has had a video sharing time of 15 seconds for stories and 1 minute for posts. With Instagram IG TV, this limitation has been extended to 1 hour. For Instagram, which has reached 1 billion active users, this was a big move in terms of rivaling Youtube. Because the ability of users to upload videos for up to 1 hour would of course increase the popularity of Instagram even more.

In this way, Instagram TV (IGTV) offers great opportunities in terms of accelerating people's recognizability, enabling artists to reach a larger audience and of course increasing sales on Instagram.

In addition to all these opportunities, IGTV has already started to offer its customers who want to buy Instagram TV views for IGTV, which will be used frequently by Instagram users. In addition, it is so easy to buy Instagram TV likes. Accelerate your organic growth with IGTV with Followers.

What is the use of buying TV views on Instagram, the most used social network in Turkey, with over 1 billion active users? Of course, it is likely to be of great benefit in accelerating organic growth and making you one of the profiles that Turkey follows.

When will Instagram TV views be delivered?

After you buy IGTV views or likes, our automated system starts working for you. Regardless of the time of the day, the Instagram TV views are transmitted to the relevant video in a very short time after your purchase. This period is usually between 1-3 hours, but in some cases it can be up to 12 hours. If you wish, you can get confirmation by contacting our customer service after placing your order.

 

How many Instagram TV views should I buy?

There are no upper/lower limits for IGTV views or likes. By making multiple purchases for the same video, you can make it gain popularity over time, or you can start growing quickly by purchasing Instagram TV views at once instead of spending time. In conclusion, both situations will be beneficial for you, as the people who will watch your Instagram TV video will be real people. But if you are hesitant, you can choose our bestselling packages. This may give you an idea.

What do you need to deliver my IGTV order?

We need a simple link to post your purchased Instagram TV views to your profile. (See https://www.instagram.com/tv/Bo0NfGyH7eN/ ) We can send Instagram TV views or Instagram TV likes with just this link without needing to access your password or profile. You will be able to send the link you want the views to be forwarded while you are purchasing your Instagram TV views. If you are still unsure of what to do, please contact our customer service representative.
